Description: Girth, fragment of a band of goat hair, two sided, mainly dark brown with decoration in cream, design reversed on back. Geometric design of bars, smaller and larger squares and rows of triangles. Towards one end, remains of a leather thong.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), West Plaza Central Section Room 146 (north of) upper fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
